message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product.  I think it could really benefit you. I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12,000?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your desire to save, however, I'm confident in the value this product brings. Could you meet me halfway at $13,500?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you at $12,800. Can you consider that?
